Description: Unique sample/construct ID tracked across all sheets.
Primary UniProt accession for the target protein.
Primary capture method (e.g., Ni-NTA for His-tag).
Synchrotron or in-house source used for data collection.
Main pipeline used (e.g., XDS, DIALS, HKL2000/3000).
Link/path to parameter file or paste key parameters.
Half-set correlation coefficient (overall or high shell).
